name: deepen
description: *  A social platform for developers where they can showcase their projects, help and inspire. A GitHub repo/user search-engine with the UX of Pinterest and UI of Behance. Users upload their work, visuals, and live links or GitHub repo where the project can be found.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
